Our focus is on great fitting fashionable cute designs. A camisole is a sleeveless undergarment for women, normally extending to the waist. The camisole is usually made of satin, nylon, or cotton. In modern usage a camisole or cami is a loose-fitting sleeveless woman's undergarment which covers the top part of the body but is shorter than a chemise. A camisole normally extends to the waist but is sometimes cropped to expose the midriff, or extended to cover the entire pelvic region. Camisoles are manufactured from light materials, commonly cotton-based, occasionally satin or silk, or stretch fabrics such as lycra, nylon, or spandex. A camisole typically has thin "spaghetti straps" and can be worn over a brassiere or without one. Since 1989, some camisoles have come with a built-in underwire bra or other support which eliminates the need for a bra among those who prefer one. Recently, camisoles have been known to be used as outerwear. A variety of sleeveless body shaping undergarments have been derived from the camisole shape, offering medium control of the bust, waist and/or abdomen. Such control camisoles are the most casual of shaping garments, covering the torso from above the chest to at or below the waist.

            Product Name: <Dearfoams Women's Original Comfort Sport Everly Mule with Faux Fur Cuff> 
            Item ID: B09BKH7XDV
            [Price]: $25.79
            Categories: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Shoes', 'Mules & Clogs']
            Description:
            Picture this: you’re out with the girls for lunch, you stop by the farmer’s market, you hike along the bike trail, and your feet still feel great. How? That’s where Dearfoams Original Comfort comes in: our line of innovative daily-wear shoes! With all the support of a shoe alongside cloud-like coziness that makes every step feel like a spa day, they’re an absolute must for tackling your to-do list. Driven by innovation from our female-led, female-founded teams, you can trust that our shoes are made with the same quality and care as our classic slippers. As comfy as our women’s slippers, our women’s footwear is sure to be a treat for your feet. Whether you’re in the mood for ballet flats, slip-on sneakers, clog sneakers, or platform sneakers, we’ve got you covered with our cozy shoes! These shock-absorbing shoes offer plenty of arch support for those extra-busy days, and our machine-washable shoes are simple to keep fresh. And with easy on/off designs, these women’s shoes are the perfect pick to leave by the door. Need a refresh after a long day? Our shoes are machine washable! Just toss them in, set up a gentle, cold cycle, and air dry. It’s as simple as that.

Trimfit was established in 1921 by Arnold, Harry and Robert Kramer. The brothers worked in a family-owned store in Manhattan, and saw an opportunity to wholesale hosiery to merchants in New York. The 1930s also marked an important event in Trimfit's history, as the company was invited to source and sell Shirley Temple socks. This product catapulted the company to a new level of sales and profitability. At this time, the Kramer brothers studied apparel manufacturing and assumed control of a textile factory in Philadelphia, which allowed them to produce and manufacture their own hosiery. 1949, Trimfit opened a state-of-the-art manufacturing facility in North Carolina. Soon after, the brothers purchased a manufacturing facility in Canada and began manufacturing and selling its products to Canadian customers. Today, our assortment includes underwear, t-shirts, training pants, slippers, footwear, thermals, sleepwear and much more!
